I'm Vonecia, and I'm a visual communicator.
I love to tell stories through photography, video and design--and I like to make you look good.
I'm usually labeled as the quiet girl because I'm an avid listener. I don't like to waste words, but believe me, I'm not afraid to use them.
I'm the one who asks too many questions, but all at the right time. I'm also the one who can’t read something without getting distracted by a grammar error and the friend who gets emails from friends asking to edit their papers.
That's because I'm a fourth-year University of Florida journalism student who has a passion for accuracy... Read more about me
